english.segment1: A poor man on the corner. I could give to You by buying him lunch. But I rarely think about it. 'Cause I got a little but it's not that much. And I pray Lord won't You help me. Give me a little bit more for myself. And You say Child won't you let me. Take all that you got and give you a little real wealth
english.segment2: And I don't know what You want. What You see in my life. And I don't know what You mean. How You could be glorified. I'm not too sure about this idea of sacrifice. What You mean by mercy, mercy in me. Your mercy in me
english.segment3: A young girl in an old house. Three kids and another on the way. She's in desperate need of some new clothes. But I keep my old ones and tell her I'll pray for her. But Your heart breaks for those kids. And that child of a mom who's one of Your own. When a few gifts and a little time is another crown. I could lay at the feet of Your throne
